_meta.description: Car Wars suspension types with Jolt Physics mapping
notes: Cost is based on percentage of body cost
Suspension adds no weight and takes no space

physics_values._notes: Physics values standardized for stable handling - suspension choice affects HC/dice, not physics
physics_values.frequency: Spring frequency in Hz - SAME for all types (3.0 = very stiff)
physics_values.damping: Damping ratio - SAME for all types (0.8 = well damped)
physics_values.travel: Suspension travel - SAME for all types (0.10m)
physics_values.design_philosophy: Cars stay stable during normal play. Disasters triggered by dice rolls apply external forces.

light.name: Light Suspension
light.notes: Standard/default suspension. HC determines handling outcomes.

improved.name: Improved Suspension
improved.notes: Costs 100% of body cost. +1 HC over light.

heavy.name: Heavy Suspension
heavy.notes: Costs 150% of body cost. +2 HC over light.

off_road.name: Off-Road Suspension
off_road.notes: Costs 500% of body cost. +1 HC off-road, negates terrain penalties.

hd_shocks.name: Heavy-Duty Shocks
hd_shocks.notes: Reduces jump landing damage by 1 die
